sentences.en: " I was only made to assuage my parents'reproductive vanity,'she says bitterly.
sentences.cn: “ 我来到这个世上只是为了满足我父母的生育虚荣心. ” 她忿忿地说.

sentences.en: And as the Vice President, I decided to assuage his doubts.
sentences.cn: 副总统先生, 我决定满足你的疑惑.

sentences.en: Charlotte would assuage him with some peculiar triumph of her culinary art.
sentences.cn: 夏洛特会用烹饪术的某种独特的“成就”使他平息下去.

sentences.en: Drug companies are hunting for molecules to assuage brain - related ills, from paralysis to shyness ( see article ).
sentences.cn: 药物公司在搜寻用以减轻大脑相关疾病的分子, 治愈瘫痪和羞怯 ( 看文章 ).

sentences.en: He has done enough – and barely enough, at that – to assuage public anger.
sentences.cn: 他付出了足够(其实是刚刚足够)的努力, 来平息公众的愤怒.

sentences.en: Little Sheep has taken pains to assuage food - safety concerns.
sentences.cn: 小肥羊尽力减轻顾客对食品安全的担心.
什么都不能减轻他的内疚。

sentences.en: One, as with indulgences, is to assuage guilt.
sentences.cn: 其一, 就像纵欲一般, 是为了减轻罪恶.

sentences.en: She was just trying to assuage her guilt by playing the devoted mother.
sentences.cn: 她装出一副慈母的样子只是想要减轻自己的罪恶感。

sentences.en: Talking to her helped to assuage my guilt.
sentences.cn: 和她交谈減轻了我的负罪感.

sentences.en: The medicine is used to assuage pain.
The retreat did little to assuage fears about high energy prices, however.
sentences.cn: 此次回调只是稍稍缓和了高能源价格所带来的压力.

sentences.en: This is unlikely to assuage critics.
sentences.cn: 但是这却不大可能平息指责.

sentences.en: This poisonous combination could fuel instability rather than assuage it.
sentences.cn: 这种有害的结合可能会助长不稳定而不是缓解.

sentences.en: We project responsibility for the attack outside ourselves in order to assuage our guilt.
sentences.cn: 为了减轻我们的罪恶感,我们把攻击投射到了外界.

sentences.en: Your messages of cheer should assuage her suffering.
sentences.cn: 你带来的这些振奋人心的消息一定能减轻她的痛苦.

trans.tran_cn: 缓和, 减轻, 镇定
trans.tran_en: to make an unpleasant feeling less painful or severe
to make an unpleasant feeling less painful or severe
